message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,000,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $900,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is below its true value. I'm willing to come down slightly to $975,000.  This is a very competitive offer considering the product's worth.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am unable to meet at $975,000. I would like to propose a price of $950,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
